reg.acttitle: Hotel Room Tax Act; Provincial Sales Tax Act*
reg.title: Hotel Room Tax Regulation for the Regional District of East Kootenay
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 12/2012, January 26, 2012]

section.sectiontext: In this regulation, Act means the Hotel Room Tax Act.

January 31, 2007 is the prescribed date after which section 3 of the Act applies in respect of accommodation purchased in the City of Fernie and in the portion of the East Kootenay Regional District Electoral Area A outlined in Schedule A attached to the Regional District of East Kootenay – Additional Hotel Room Tax Bylaw No. 1909, 2006.

The tax payable under section 3 (1) of the Act is 2% of the purchase price of accommodation purchased in the City of Fernie and in the portion of the East Kootenay Regional District Electoral Area A outlined in Schedule A attached to the Regional District of East Kootenay – Additional Hotel Room Tax Bylaw No. 1909, 2006.

section.marginalnote: Prescribed purpose for expenditure of tax
section.sectiontext: The East Kootenay Regional District may spend the amount paid to it out of the revenue collected from the tax for tourism marketing, programs and projects.
This regulation is repealed effective February 1, 2017.
